hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CREDENTIALS_ID_SOE_CI_IN_JENKINS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The credentials id of the user configured in Jenkins to checkout the soe-ci repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SOE_CI_REPO_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The git repoistory url to checkout the 'soe-ci' project.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SOE_CI_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch to checkout of the 'soe-ci' repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CREDENTIALS_ID_ACME_SOE_IN_JENKINS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The credentials id of the user configured in Jenkins to checkout the acme-soe repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ACME_SOE_REPO_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The git repoistory url to checkout the 'acme-soe' project.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ACME_SOE_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch to checkout of the 'acme-soe' repo.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: REBUILD_VMS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether or not to rebuild the test VMs before running the tests

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: POWER_OFF_VMS_AFTER_BUILD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether or not to power off the VMs after the build. The build result (successful / failed) is not taken into consideration.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: PUPPET_ONLY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether or not only puppet modules should be built and pushed.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: CLEAN_WORKSPACE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether or not to clean the workspace before the job execution.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: VERBOSE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether or not to run the executed scripts in a verbose mode.
